text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-transport-code-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 8 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplayDefinition
http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/transport-code5.0.0  abortMark the focal resource as no longer activeAbort, cancel or withdraw the focal resource, as appropriate for the type of resource.
http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/transport-code5.0.0  approveActivate/approve the focal resourceTake what actions are needed to transition the focus resource from 'draft' to 'active' or 'in-progress', as appropriate for the resource type. This may involve additing additional content, approval, validation, etc.
http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/transport-code5.0.0  changeChange the focal resourceUpdate the focal resource of the owning system to reflect the content specified as the Task.focus
http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/transport-code5.0.0  fulfillFulfill the focal requestAct to perform the actions described in the focus request. This might result in a 'more assertive' request (order for a plan or proposal, filler order for a placer order), but is intend to eventually result in events. The degree of fulfillment requested might be limited by Task.restriction.
http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/transport-code5.0.0  instantiateInstantiate the focal definitionAct to perform the actions defined in the focus definition resource (ActivityDefinition, PlanDefinition, Questionnaire, etc.) For PlanDefinition or ActivityDefinition, this might result in a 'more assertive' request (order for a plan or proposal, filler order for a placer order), but is intend to eventually result in events. For Questionnaire, this would result in a QuestionnaireResponse - and possibly resources constructed using data extracted from the response. The degree of fulfillment requested might be limited by Task.restriction.
http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/transport-code5.0.0  replaceReplace the focal resource with the input resourceReplace the focal resource with the specified input resource
http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/transport-code5.0.0  resumeRe-activate the focal resourceTransition the focal resource from 'suspended' to 'active' or 'in-progress' as appropriate for the resource type.
http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/transport-code5.0.0  suspendSuspend the focal resourceTransition the focal resource from 'active' or 'in-progress' to 'suspended'

name: R5TransportCodeForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.TransportCode for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/transport-code|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/transport-code|5.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* `Transport.code`

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:

FHIR ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/transport-code|5.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4

concept.display: Mark the focal resource as no longer active
Replace the focal resource with the input resource

contains.display: Mark the focal resource as no longer active
Replace the focal resource with the input resource
